title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. U, ch. I, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 6022 - Police In-service Training Courses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. U, ch. I, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 6022 - Police In-service Training Courses

State Regulations
§ 6022.1 - Definitions
§ 6022.2 - Statement of purpose
§ 6022.3 - Minimum standards
§ 6022.4 - Requirements for approval of a police in-service training course
§ 6022.5 - Requirements for conducting a MPTC-certified in-service training course
§ 6022.6 - Requirements for issuance of a MPTC certificate of completion for a MPTC in-service training course
§ 6022.7 - Requirements for self-issuance of a non-MPTC certificate of attendance for a non- MPTC-certified in-service training course

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. U, ch. I, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 6022

Statutory authority: Executive Law, art. 35, §§ 840, 842

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
